SELECT TT."day", IDBP.WEBSITE "webSite", IDBP.PAGE_NAME "pageName", IDBP.PAGE_POSITION "pagePosition", IDBP.POINT_FLAG "pointFlag", TT."pv", TT."uv", TT."vv", TT."ip" FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(T.CREATE_TIME, 'yyyy/MM/dd') "day", T.REPORT_CONTENT, COUNT(1) "pv", COUNT(DISTINCT T.SESSION_ID) "uv", COUNT(DISTINCT T.COOKIE_INFO) "vv", COUNT(DISTINCT T.SOURCE_IP) "ip" FROM (SELECT RD.CREATE_TIME, RD.REPORT_CONTENT, RD.COOKIE_INFO, CASE WHEN RD.SESSION_ID IS NULL THEN RD.COOKIE_INFO ELSE RD.SESSION_ID END SESSION_ID, RD.SOURCE_IP FROM (SELECT * FROM T_REPORT_DATA_9 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM T_REPORT_DATA_10) RD WHERE RD.URL_DOMAIN = 'rd.iuni.com' AND RD.REPORT_TYPE = 'rtag' AND RD.REPORT_CONTENT IN (SELECT POINT_FLAG FROM IUNI_DA_BURIED_POINT WHERE STATUS = 1 AND CANCEL_FLAG = 0)
AND RD.CREATE_TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startDateStr}, 'yyyy/MM/dd')
AND RD.CREATE_TIME < TO_DATE(#{endDateStr}, 'yyyy/MM/dd') + 1
) T GROUP BY TO_CHAR(T.CREATE_TIME, 'yyyy/MM/dd'), T.REPORT_CONTENT) TT LEFT JOIN IUNI_DA_BURIED_POINT IDBP ON IDBP.POINT_FLAG = TT.REPORT_CONTENT
